a-avatar/icon.description: the Icon type for an icon avatar, see Icon Component

a-avatar/src.description: the address of the image for an image avatar

a-avatar/srcSet.description: a list of sources to use for different screen resolutions

a-avatar/alt.description: This attribute defines the alternative text describing the image

a-avatar/loadError.description: handler when img load errorï¼Œreturn false to prevent default fallback behavior
